elements.name: question_001
elements.title: In the past 30 days, how many times have you purchased something online using your smartphone?

choices: Digital Wallet (e.g., Apple Pay, Google Pay)
Buy Now, Pay Later (e.g., Afterpay, Klarna)
elements.name: question_002
elements.title: When you reach the checkout page, which payment method do you use most frequently?

choices: Yes, I spent several minutes looking
No, I just wanted to finish the transaction
I only use codes if they are automatically applied
elements.name: question_003
elements.title: Think about the last time you bought something online. Did you actively search for a discount code or rewards opportunity before paying?

elements.name: question_004
elements.title: How often do you currently use cashback apps or loyalty programs when shopping?

elements.name: question_005
elements.title: How frustrating is it when you realize you missed a discount after completing a purchase?

elements.name: question_006
elements.title: What is the hardest part about managing different rewards, points, or cashback programs?

elements.name: question_007
elements.title: Compared to other shopping tools you've tried, how much time do you feel is wasted manually hunting for valid promo codes?

elements.name: question_008
elements.title: When using a mobile payment gateway, how often do you feel like you are getting the 'best possible price'?

elements.name: question_009
elements.title: What is the one thing you wish worked better when you are redirected to a payment screen?

elements.name: question_010
elements.title: Based on the description above, how valuable would this service be for your daily shopping?

elements.name: question_011
elements.title: Imagine this existed today—how would it change your approach to online shopping?

choices: The automatic nature (no searching for codes)
Having all my rewards in one central app
elements.name: question_012
elements.title: Which of these benefits matters most to you?

elements.name: question_013
elements.title: To receive these automatic discounts, would you be willing to route your payments through the Shopback portal?

choices: Nothing, it must be perfectly seamless
elements.name: question_014
elements.title: What would you be willing to 'give up' or tolerate to have this feature?

elements.name: question_015
elements.title: If this app required a small monthly 'premium' fee to unlock higher cashback tiers (up to 10%), how likely would you be to pay for it?

elements.name: question_016
elements.title: What is the biggest benefit or 'win' you see in this solution?

elements.name: question_017
elements.title: Is there anything else you’d want this solution to do for you to make it even more useful?
